projects.title: YYC Food Trucks - Employee & Event Management System
projects.description: Developed a comprehensive full-stack platform for food truck operations management. Implemented features including employee scheduling, event coordination, shift tracking, and real-time availability monitoring. Built with modern web technologies and a focus on scalability and user experience.

projects.title: Rollin' in Dough
projects.description: Developed a sweet e-commerce platform for a local baker. Now cookie lovers can order their fix 24/7.

projects.title: No Cap Cafe
projects.description: Developed a comprehensive restaurant management system that handles everything from table assignments to order tracking.

projects.title: Noize
projects.description: Developed a music streaming platform featuring playlist management, search functionality, and a clean user interface. Built with modern web technologies and focused on delivering a smooth user experience.
